post.text: If Republicans actually wanted to protect women's health, they'd support Planned Parenthoodâ€”not attack it.

comment.author: Taylor
comment.text: If republican's collected $10's of millions from countries that abuse women and treat them as second class citizens, what would you call that?

replies.author: Mckenzie
replies.text: Easy. If they turn the money around to help women in those countries, as Hillary does, I would call that pretty smart.

replies.author: Taylor
replies.text: So how are women treated better now in Muslim countries that paid for favors?
